name: FlexXX 炫
content: 跟着律动 dancing till the sunrise
气场高调但从容的坦然
加大的马力 飞驰中漂移
就这么轻易 记录破到顶
Oh I feel like 与生俱来
感受这节拍 you can't kill my vibe
Know I'm not a bad boy
Do it all night long all night long
I'll show you how to fly
Oh I wanna hear you scream out loud
状态 ready go hard all day
Never wanna stop can I get a replay
随时待命 不需要准备
感受这节拍 you can't kill my vibe
Know I'm not a bad boy
Do it all night long all night long
I'll show you how to fly
Oh I wanna hear you scream out loud
想去挑战各种不同难题
让我期待 wanna dance like this
I can go all night long
但清楚记着当时定下的决心
There ain't no much more to say
I wanna hear you scream my name
Know I'm not a bad boy
Do it all night long all night long
I'll show you how to fly
Oh I wanna hear you scream out loud
